title: 2 rooms flat furnished haussmanien building
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


55 sqm flat in the heart of Paris. Fully furnished. High ceiling, hard wood floor, haussmanien building with lift, intercom and digicode. Safe and quiet neighborhood. 
Entrance hall, separate kitchen, drawing room, bedroom, bathroom. South exposure, full of natural light. Available from now onwards. Short or long term.
Monthly rent : 1600 euros including building charges , central heating and hot water.
No broker fees, direct from owner.
